pr_title: SSL / BlockHound works out of the box with the default SSL provider

timeline.message:
SSL / BlockHound works out of the box with the default SSL provider

Motivation:

JDK is the default SSL provider and internally uses blocking IO operations.

Modifications:

Add allowBlockingCallsInside configuration for SslHandler handshake function.

Result:

When BlockHound is installed, SSL works out of the box with the default SSL provider.
